name: Three Free
description:
Created in 48h for GGJ 2022. It's about how human behaviours are directly or indirectly influenced by each other. In this platform we want to separate the intelligent people from the followers like sheep. We find the group who talk with words that have similar sounds (Rhymes) and hang them from ceiling to prepare the remaining selected people for the next experiment.

Move with W A S D

Grab Items : Left / Right Mouse click holding

Select and Deselect ragdolls : Mouse Click
